text: Wieluń is a city in the central part of Poland in Łódź Voivodeship. Around 27,000 people live here. The city was started in 1283. == Twin towns == Wieluń is twinned with: * Adelebsen, Germany * Osterburg, Germany * Ochtrup, Germany * Letterkenny, Ireland == Other websites == *Official city webpage Category:Cities in Łódź Voivodeship
title: Wieluń
